game.name: Tile World
game.desc: Tile World is a game designed to "emulate" Chip's Challenge originally released in 1989. It was written by Brian Raiter. In 2000, Brian Raiter decided to make a port of the MS version to Linux. Chuck Sommerville, the original author of Chip's Challenge, supported his plan and convinced him to make it possible to also emulate the Lynx set of rules. The first version of Tile World was released in 2002
